name: DXTDecompressor Source V3
author: josephthekp
description: Removing compression artifacts from DXT1 compressed textures. This model was created to remove DXT1 compression artifacts from textures imported into the Source Engine. Compressed textures in the engine sometimes have a green-tint which this model also corrects. The data for this model contained a good mix of diffuse textures and normal maps which means this model is pretty good at removing compression from normals as well. Creating this model was a real learning experience for me and I hope someone finds a good use for it.
dataset: Uncompressed textures from various Source Engine games (https://github.com/JosephtheKP/sourceengine_tga_archive) and some data provided by friends
